front.title: Update to Recommended Codecs for the AVP RTP Profile

abstract.t: [RFC3551] defines the AVP RTP profile, which is the basis for many other profiles, such as SAVP [RFC3711], AVPF [RFC4585], and SAVPF [RFC5124]. This document updates [RFC3551] (and by extension, the profiles that build upon it) to reflect changes in audio codec usage since the document was originally published.
